original_text: Yet she increased her whoring, remembering the days of her youth, when she played the whore in the land of Egypt
korean_text: 그가 그의 음행을 더하여 젊었을 때 곧 애굽 땅에서 행음하던 때를 생각하고

sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그녀는 그 행음을 더욱 늘렸다

sentences.original_text: remembering the days of her youth
when she played the whore in the land of Egypt
